project(boost_interprocess VERSION "${BOOST_SUPERPROJECT_VERSION}" LANGUAGES CXX)

add_library(boost_interprocess INTERFACE)
add_library(Boost::interprocess ALIAS boost_interprocess)

target_link_libraries(boost_interprocess
  INTERFACE
    Boost::assert
    Boost::config
    Boost::container
    Boost::core
    Boost::intrusive
    Boost::move

    Boost::type_traits
    Boost::winapi
)
